snippet: Antonio Bolfo was bored, so he became a police officer. To relieve the stress of patrolling South Bronx housing projects, he took a camera on the job. It led to a new career.
abstract: Antonio Bolfo was bored, so he became a police officer. To relieve the stress of patrolling South Bronx housing projects, he took a camera on the job. It led to a new career.
lead_paragraph: There are all sorts of reasons why people become New York City police officers. Tradition. Family ties. The pension. Antonio Bolfo's reasoning was simple.

headline.main: On the Beat: With a Gun and a Camera
